creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Albert and Betty Elliott
description: triptych, night scene: female character in white robe at L with candles on head, leaning toward group of male characters who brandish swords, umbrellas, and a lantern; male characters wear richly decorated clothing
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and colors on paper
title: Kabuki Actors
